property.name: _windowProperties
property.value: {bounds={235, 115, 1120, 781}, maximized=false}

property.name: text
property.value: Fake watch outputs a gesture (up, down, or rotate) every 'interval' ms.

property.name: text
property.value: Output the command associated with the gesture. If a new command arrives within 'waitTime' of a gesture, or vice versa, map the new command to the gesture.

property.name: text
property.value:
Generate text from speech. Uses dictionary of common English phrases, plus commands.
** Note: New commands must be added to phrases.samples and the dictionary and language model files must be regenerated using CMU LM tool: http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/tools/lmtool-new.html
Phrase list was imported from: http://www.norbertschmitt.co.uk/uploads/phrase-list-11.doc
For more information on the phrase list, see: http://www.norbertschmitt.co.uk/resources.html

property.name: text
property.value:
A service that translates gestures to commands and allows remapping of commands through voice control.
If a gesture and utterance arrive within a certain time interval of each other, the gesture will be remapped.
Model stops after 60 seconds.

property.name: text
property.value: Screen speech for commands.

property.name: text
property.value: Author: Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: description
property.value: Speech recognition accessor. This accessor opens an audio channel, listens for speech, then returns text.

property.name: author
property.value: Elizabeth Osyk

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: SpeechRecognition.js 1981 2017-07-28 11:57:04Z cxh $$

property.name: start (port)
property.value: Start listening for speech.

property.name: stop (port)
property.value: Stop listening for speech.

property.name: text (port)
property.value: The text of any detected speech.

property.name: description
property.value: Test accessor that spontaneously produces outputs once per time interval. This implementation produces a counting sequence.

property.name: author
property.value: Christopher Brooks and Edward A. Lee. Based on TestSpontaneous by Edward A. Lee

property.name: version
property.value: $$Id: TestSpontaneousOnce.js 1659 2017-05-09 14:26:57Z cxh $$

property.name: output (port)
property.value: The output port

property.name: delay (parameter)
property.value: The delay in milliseconds before the value is outputk.

property.name: value (parameter)
property.value: The value to be output after the delay.
